channel.title: Need help on changing the client background on Hybrid pvp v3 "Webclient"
channel.description: Ok so before i start 90% credits to kevin for making it. but When i downloaded his package which included source,client, And the webclient file the cache wasn't in the webclient and I want to change the client background.. Anyone help?

item.title: Need help on changing the client background on Hybrid pvp v3 "Webclient"
item.dc:creator: @i_fail_serv i fail serv
item.description:
@i_fail_serv wrote:

Sprite.java search

and you will get some like this

Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().createImage(abyte0);
				MediaTracker mediatracker = new MediaTracker(component);
				mediatracker.addImage(image, 0);
				mediatracker.waitForAll();
				myWidth = image.getWidth(component);
				myHeight = image.getHeight(component);
				maxWidth = myWidth;
				maxHeight = myHeight;
				anInt1442 = 0;
				anInt1443 = 0;
				myPixels = new int[myWidth * myHeight];
				PixelGrabber pixelgrabber = new PixelGrabber(image, 0, 0, myWidth, myHeight, myPixels, 0, myWidth);
				pixelgrabber.grabPixels();

Replace this

Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().createImage(abyte0);

to

Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().createImage(location+"BCK.png");

Replace the “BCK” with your’s background name but don’t put the “Background” because the cache it’s packed.
exaple

NewPic

THE CACHE it’s on C:/ Drive because it’s the webclient you can make this to “normal” client. Go singlink and search

 public static String findcachedir() {
        String as[] = {"C:/"};

Replace with

 public static String findcachedir() {
        String as[] = {"./Cache/"};

Np. i was time to help you.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help on changing the client background on Hybrid pvp v3 "Webclient"
